items/other/blacksmithing/pick_axe_coppe: A copper pickaxe. Can break big rocks & can be charged to strike 3 tiles in a row.
items/other/blacksmithing/pick_axe_gold/: A splendid golden pickaxe. Can be charged to chop a 6x6 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/pick_axe_iron/: An iron pickaxe. Can be charged to strike a 3x3 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/pick_axe_mistr: A pickaxe made from mistril. Can be charged to strike a 6x9 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/pick_axe_silve: A silver pickaxe. Can be charged to strike a 3x6 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/pick_axe_worn/: A worn but still serviceable pickaxe. Used to break small rocks and to excavate dig spots.
